column1: Text data

My dad is in a hospital for the first time and I’m feeling alone and hopeless : I’m in the middle of exams, and my dad has been in the hospital for 4 days now, he has been very sick and we were told he may be there for a long time. I’m doing everything I can to help my mom out, but I feel so alone and helpless. I feel so guilty that I can’t be there for him, and I can

I can’t take it anymore. : I’m tired. I’m exhausted. I’m tired of crying every day. I’m tired of thinking about my mom and how much I miss her. I’m tired of feeling like a burden to my family. I’m tired of thinking about how much of a failure I am. I’m tired of not having anyone to talk to. I’m tired of not being able to get help. I’m tired

I'm tired of this life : I'm tired of feeling sad. I'm tired of feeling empty. I'm tired of feeling alone. I'm tired of feeling like I don't have anyone. I'm tired of feeling like no one cares. I'm tired of feeling like I'm nothing. I'm tired of feeling like I'm worthless. I'm tired of feeling like I'm just a burden to everyone. I'

I just want to be normal : I have anxiety and depression and it's making me feel like a failure. I don't know how to be normal and have a normal life. I have friends but I feel like I'm holding them back. I just want to be normal

I have never felt so helpless : I just feel like my depression is a burden to everyone in my life and I can't do anything about it. It's like I have this monster inside me that I can't get rid of. I just want to feel good for once, I just want to be happy and feel loved. But I don't even know what love is anymore.

I am so alone : I feel like I’m a robot, I don’t have emotions, I’m numb to everything. I feel like no one cares about me. I have 1 friend but she’s always busy and I don’t even know if she cares about me. I don’t know what to do, I’m so tired of this. I don’t want to be here anymore.

My dad has cancer : My dad has been diagnosed with cancer and it's a pretty serious one too. He has a tumor in his stomach. He has a lot of things to do, like chemotherapy and surgeries. It's really scary and I don't know what to do. I don't know how to help him and I don't know how to support him. I'm really scared and I don't know what to do. I'

I'm too stupid to do anything right : I can't focus on school, I'm not doing well in any of my classes, I'm not doing well in my job. I can't even keep a simple friendship or a girlfriend. I can't even talk to my family without getting angry. I can't even make a simple fucking dinner for myself. I can't even get a fucking girlfriend. I'm too stupid for anything. I'm

I'm just so lonely : I've been thinking about this all day and I just want to cry. I'm 18 and I have a lot of things going on. I have depression and anxiety. I don't have many friends and I feel like I'm just wasting my time. I have so much to do but I can't get myself to do anything. I just want to be happy but I feel like I'll never be. I'

I don’t know what to do anymore : I have a pretty good life and a good job, but I can’t seem to get over the feeling of being completely and utterly worthless. 
I feel like I’m just going through the motions, I’m just going through the day and not really living. I’m not happy, but I’m not sad. I’m just empty. I have no feelings. I have no emotions. I don’

I have never been so sad in my life : I'm 21 and I feel like I have no future. I'm stuck in a dead end job with no future, no career prospects, no girlfriend, no friends, no support from my family, no motivation to do anything. I'm at a loss. I don't know what to do. I'm not even sure if I'm depressed. I'm just lost.
I just want to die : [removed]
I have no one : I have nobody. I have no friends, I have no family, I have no love, I have no one.

I am so tired of feeling alone. : I feel like no one understands what I’m going through and I’m tired of having to explain myself. 
I just want someone to hold me and tell me that everything is going to be okay.

I don't know what to do : I don't know what to do. 
I'm so tired of being so tired. 
I'm so tired of being so tired of being so tired. 
I'm so tired of being so tired of being so tired of being so tired. 
I'm so tired of being so tired of being so tired of being so tired of being so tired.

I'm not good enough for her : I've always had this fear that she's just using me for her own benefit. I know it sounds crazy but she's just so... perfect. I've never met someone so perfect, it's crazy. I feel like I'm not good enough for her and that's the reason she's always so cold to me. I feel like she's just using me for her own benefit and I'm not

I feel like I’m not even a human being. : I don’t know why but I just feel like I’m not even a human being. I don’t feel like I even exist. I don’t know what it is but it’s just there. I’m not even sure how to describe it. I just feel like I’m a shell of a human being.
I'm done : I'm done. I'm so tired. I'm tired of being so sad. I'm tired of thinking about death. I'm tired of everything.

How can I get better at talking to people : I'm a really nice guy and people always say I'm funny but I just can't get the words out of my mouth. I've always been shy but I don't know why I'm so shy. I'm really lonely and I want to talk to people but I just can't. I've tried practicing in front of the mirror but it's not working.

I want to live, but I don't want to be alive : I've always been an optimist, but lately I've been thinking about what I'd want to do if I could leave this world and just die. I've been so depressed lately, but I don't want to be depressed. I want to be happy. I'm a happy person. I'm just sad. I want to live, but I don't want to be alive

I’m not even sure I’m depressed anymore, I just don’t care anymore. : I used to have depression, I used to have anxiety, I used to be suicidal. I was diagnosed with both at 13. Now I’m 18 and I don’t care anymore. I just don’t care. I have no ambition, I have no passion. I don’t care if I die, I don’t care if I

I hate the things that I've seen and done here. I hate the memories that come back to me when I go home. I'm so afraid of what my family might do. I'm afraid of what my friends might

What do I do? : Hi, I'm 15 and I'm having a really hard time. I feel like no one cares about me and I don't have any friends. I'm really depressed and I feel like I don't matter to anyone. I'm not sure what to do anymore.

I can’t do it anymore : I can’t do it anymore. I’ve tried everything. What should I do? : I feel like I'm about to go crazy. 
I'm 22, I have a job, but I'm still not making enough money. I feel like I'm going crazy. 
I feel like I have no purpose, no motivation, and no will to live. 
I'm lonely and I feel like I'm going to die alone. 
I feel like I'm worthless.

I'm afraid I'll fail and be stuck in this job I don't want to do. I want to help people, but I'm afraid I'll end up hurting them. I don't know what to do

I'm 20 and I'm getting ready to give up on life : I'm 20 and I'm getting ready to give up on life. 
I'm tired of the pain, the constant sadness, the anxiety, the depression. I'm tired of all the emotions and the bullshit. I'm tired of living with no purpose and no meaning. 
I've been thinking about suicide for a long time. I've never

I'm scared that I'm going to lose all my friends. I'm scared that I'm going to be alone. I'm scared that I'm going to die. I'm scared that

Is there any way to stop the feeling of sadness? : I have been feeling this way for almost 2 years now and i am getting really tired of it. I am 19 years old and i just want to be happy again. I have tried to be positive and be thankful for what i have but i still feel sad. Is there any way to stop feeling sadness?

I’m tired of being alone : I just want to talk to someone who isn’t my family. I have no friends. I’m tired of being depressed. I’m tired of being tired all the time. I’m tired of feeling empty and alone. I’m tired of feeling like I’m the only one. I’m tired of having no one to turn to. I’m tired of not being good enough. I’m tired of being a burden
It’s the 21st of October. I’m 21. I’m not depressed. I’m not anxious. I’m not sad. I’m just a fuck up. : [removed]

I don't even know what I'm feeling anymore. : I have no motivation to do anything, I can't get out of bed, I can't focus on anything, I have no friends, I have no family, I have no support, I have no drive, I have no reason to live. I don't even know what I'm feeling anymore.

I am a sad person : I don't know what to do anymore. I feel like I'm not worth anything. I feel like I'm a burden to my family and my friends. I don't know what I'm doing wrong. I just don't want to feel this way anymore. I don't know what to do.

I don't have a career. I don't have a family. I don't have a purpose. I'm 23 years old and I've already given up on life.

One day, I received a message from a friend of mine from my hometown. He was passing through my city and wanted to meet up for a beer

I don't know if it's just fear, or what.

I feel like I’m getting more depressed than him. I don’t know what to do anymore, it’s getting harder and harder to wake up and go to school and do my work. I feel like I’m going crazy.

I want to live because I don’t want to die, but I don’t want to live because it’s painful and I hate it. I just want to sleep.
